member.name: T:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages
member.summary: Wrapper library providing simplified access to Vault messaging with/without user interaction.

member.name: T:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons
member.summary: Optional buttons to be added to message, warning or restriction dialogs.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.None
member.summary: The dialog contains a default OK button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.Abort
member.summary: The dialog contains an Abort button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.SkipAll
member.summary: The dialog contains a Skip, Skip All, and an OK Button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.YesNo
member.summary: The dialog contains a Yes and a No button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.RetryCancel
member.summary: The dialog contains a Retry and a Cancel button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.Ok
member.summary: The dialog contains an OK button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.OkCancel
member.summary: The dialog contains an OK and a Cancel button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.YesNoCancel
member.summary: The dialog contains a Yes, No and a Cancel button.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons.ContinueCancel
member.summary: The dialog contains a Continue and a Cancel button.
member.remarks: The return values are "Yes" for Continue and "Cancel" for Cancel

member.name: T:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.IconType
member.summary: Icons indicating the message types error, information, warning.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.IconType.Error
member.summary: The error icon, an X in a red circle.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.IconType.Info
member.summary: The information icon, a lower-case I in a blue circle.

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.IconType.Warning
member.summary: The warning icon, an exclamation mark in a yellow triangle.

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowError(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays an error dialog box with the specified error message. Supports dark/light theme.
member.param: The error message text.
The dialog title.

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowMessage(System.String,System.String,AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons)
member.summary: Displays a message dialog box with the specified message. Supports dark/light theme.
member.param: The message text.
The dialog title.
Default = OK. Alternate options are Abort, SkipAll, Yes/No, Retry/Cancel, Continue/Cancel, OK/Cancel
member.returns: The button's text value clicked by the user. Values are:"Abort" (Abort, SkipAll), "Yes", "No", "Retry", "Cancel", "OK", "Ignore" (Ignore, Skip)

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowMessageWithObjectList(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons)
member.summary: Displays a message dialog providing a list of affected object names.
member.returns: The button's text value clicked by the user. Values are:"Abort" (Abort, SkipAll), "Yes", "No", "Retry", "Cancel", "OK", "Ignore" (Ignore, Skip)

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowErrorWithObjectList(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons)
member.summary: Displays an error dialog providing a list of affected object names.
member.returns: The button's text value clicked by the user. Values are:"Abort" (Abort, SkipAll), "Yes", "No", "Retry", "Cancel", "OK", "Ignore" (Ignore, Skip)

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowWarning(System.String,System.String,AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons)
member.summary: Displays a warning message dialog box with the specified warning. Supports dark/light theme.
member.param: The text describing the warning.
The dialog title.
Default = OK. Alternate options are Abort, SkipAll, Yes/No, Retry/Cancel, Continue/Cancel, OK/Cancel
member.returns: The button's text value clicked by the user. Values are:"Abort" (Abort, SkipAll), "Yes", "No", "Retry", "Cancel", "OK", "Ignore" (Ignore, Skip)

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowMessageGrid(System.Collections.Generic.List{AdskTsVaultUtils.ObjectGrid.TableRow},System.String,System.String,AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons)
member.summary: Displays a message dialog providing a table with 3 columns to list object name, short text, and long text.
member.param: Data matrix of 3 columns (object name, short text, long text)
member.returns: The button's text value clicked by the user. Values are:"Abort" (Abort, SkipAll), "Yes", "No", "Retry", "Cancel", "OK", "Ignore" (Ignore, Skip)

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowErrorGrid(System.Collections.Generic.List{AdskTsVaultUtils.ObjectGrid.TableRow},System.String,System.String,AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.Buttons)
member.summary: Displays an error dialog providing a table with 3 columns to list object name, short text, and long text.
member.param: Data matrix of 3 columns (object name, short text, long text)
member.returns: The button's text value clicked by the user. Values are:"Abort" (Abort, SkipAll), "Yes", "No", "Retry", "Cancel", "OK", "Ignore" (Ignore, Skip)

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.ShowCustomRestriction(System.Collections.Generic.List{AdskTsVaultUtils.ObjectGrid.TableRow},System.String,System.String,AdskTsVaultUtils.Messages.IconType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Launches an user interactive workflow informing and handling custom restrictions.
member.param: List of restricted object names, restriction text and restriction reason.
The dialog title.
The Icon illustrating the type of the restriction.
Optional. Expands detail area if set to true.
member.returns: The button's text value clicked by the user. Values are:"Abort" (Abort, SkipAll), "Yes", "No", "Retry", "Cancel", "OK", "Ignore" (Ignore, Skip)

member.name: T:AdskTsVaultUtils.EntityProperties
member.summary: Library for simplified properties read/write actions for all entity types

member.name: F:AdskTsVaultUtils.EntityProperties.conn
member.summary: Any Vault interaction requires an active Client-Server connection. To avoid Vault API specific references, check connection state using the loggedIn property.

member.name: P:AdskTsVaultUtils.EntityProperties.LoggedIn
member.summary: Property representing the current user's Vault connection state; returns true, if current user is logged in.

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.EntityProperties.GetVaultConnection
member.summary: Deprecated. Returns current Vault connection. Leverage LoggedIn property whenever possible. Null value returned if user is not logged in.

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.EntityProperties.mGetFileProps(Autodesk.Connectivity.WebServices.File,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Get File properties as DisplayName/Value map
member.param: Autodesk Connectivity Webservice File Version (Iteration) Object
DisplayName/Value dictionary of file iteration's properties

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.EntityProperties.mGetItemProps(Autodesk.Connectivity.WebServices.Item,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Get Item properties as DisplayName/Value map
member.param: Autodesk Connectivity Webservice Item object
DisplayName/Value dictionary of Item version's properties

member.name: M:AdskTsVaultUtils.EntityProperties.mGetFolderProps(Autodesk.Connectivity.WebServices.Folder,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Get Folder properties as DisplayName/Value map
member.param: Autodesk Connectivity Webservice File Version (Iteration) Object
DisplayName/Value dictionary of file iteration's properties
